summary: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.
cast: Dorothy McGuire|Fess Parker|Jeff York|Chuck Connors|Beverly Washburn|Tommy Kirk|Kevin Corcoran|Spike
title: Fiel amigo
